description: Hirao and Yabe were both members of the Kendo team years ago, when Yabe was the undisputed strongest. Then something happened and Yabe's life took a 180 degree turn. Hirao now resents Yabe's playful flirting with Yuri, and is doing his best to protect her. Meanwhile, the attention of all three is having lots of unwanted side effects for Yuri. Will the four ever get this mess straightened out? And what is the event that happened a year ago between Motoko, Yabe and Hirao that only Yuri seems unaware of? Only Time will tell...
name: Vol. 1

description: It's summer, and Yuri and Motoko have decided to go to the annual summer fireworks festival. Along the way, both Yabe and Hirao join them. Casual conversation ends up bringing up touchy subjects like Motoko's heritage, Yabe's past, Hirao's growing feelings for Yuri, and how Hirao and Yabe first. What mischief does Motoko have planned when she finds out Hirao has budding feelings for Yuri?
name: Vol. 2

description: The saga of the love "square" continues in this third volume of Gatcha Gacha. Yuri, Motoko, Yabe and Hirao are still trying to straighten out who should be with whom. Hirao resents Yabe's constant flirting with Yuri. But, whom does Motoko have her eyes set on, Yabe or Hirao? Yuri will be shocked when she finds out Motoko's love interest!
name: Vol. 3

description: Yabe has finally asked Yuri out, and the two have officially begun dating. Although Yuri wants the world to know, not everyone is happy about it. Hirao doesn’t seem happy and finds an escape for his unhappiness. Yabe’s ex-girlfriend Aki challenges Yuri to a fight. And there’s Motoko spreading rumors about Yuri’s unhappiness. What else could ruin this relationship?
name: Vol. 4

description: Yuri and Yabe's relationship is thrown for a curve when they encounter Kagami, a girl who looks exactly like Motoko's older sister Kanako--otherwise known as Yabe's dead crush. Kagami claims never to have met Yabe, but everyone senses that something is amiss. Yuri goes to search for answers...and for Motoko, who has been mysteriously absent since the Culture Festival...
name: Vol. 5

description: With the reappearance of Kanako--who is alive and well--Yuri's relationship with Yabe comes to an abrupt end. And all that stress over her problems with Yabe has caused Yuri to develop an ever-growing bald spot on the back of her head! With Hirao always there to help her, will Yuri finally fall for him? Or does she still only have eyes for Yabe?
name: Vol. 6

description: As Motoko and Yuri head to school, they bump into an odd girl named Sae, an acquaintance of Motoko's from junior high. What happened between these two and does it explain Motoko's current behavior? And as if one blast from the past wasn't enough, a young man shows up from England...claiming to be Motoko's brother! Revelations abound in this volume of Gatcha Gacha!
name: Vol. 7

description: This book contains reprints of the newspaper strip from 1/15/49 through 4/5/49. It includes the conclusion of the "New Cop in Town" (a.k.a. "Skeets") story arc.

Invaders have infiltrated the Earth. Our only hope of stopping them lies in the hands of "GateKeepers" like Shun Ukiya, a high school student with psychic powers. He and his fellow A.E.G.I.S. team members are the last defense against a relentless alien force.
name: Vol. 1

description: Enter Reiji, a powerful human boy who sides with the invaders and is determined to destroy The GateKeepers... and just when it looks like yet another of his agents have crumbled at the hands of The GateKeepers, Reiji decides to take matters into his own hands...
name: Vol. 2

description: It's a thrilling and romantic tale of an erotic novelist and his formerly aristocratic footman, set just before the French Revolution! Gerard frees Jacques from a high-class brothel in order to teach the boy how hard it is to make a living as a commoner, only to end up hiring him to be his footman. But when Jacques discovers that Gerard really does want a footman, not a live-in lover, a friendship--and possibly something more--begins to form between the two.
name: Vol. 1

description: On the verge of the French Revolution, Jacques' mother finally decides to search for him. Gerard lets him go, seeing the boy depart for a life of luxury and pleasure, with no expectations of his return. But Jacques is unable to hide his feelings for Gerard, much to Gerard's dismay. It goes against his sense of honor to take advantage of such a naive youth. Can Jacques weather the revolution--and Gerard's heart?
name: Vol. 2

description:
After retrieving a lucky cat for their clients, the GetBackers discover a floppy disc that was left behind after the cat was returned. However, the floppy disc was what the clients were really after and they will do anything to get it back. Can Ginji and Ban save HEVN from Dr. Kabutogawa or will they end up for sale on the black market?

Chapter Titles

Act II: The Case of the Lucky Cat

  • Part 3: Don't Go Taking My Heart
  • Part 4: Get Ready to Rumble
  • Part 5: Foolish Dreams

Act III: Givers and Takers

  • Part 1: Real Estate Speculation
  • Part 2: Keep on Truckin'
  • Part 3: On the Road Again
  • Part 4: Bitter Reunion (misspelled as Reuinion in the table of contents only)
  • Part 5: A Slice of the Pie
name: Vol. 2

description:
The world's finest retrieval team is getting back in action! Ginji and Ban successfully track down a mysterious box from the Transporters, but the Transporters won't give up without a fight. When Ban uses his 'Evil Eye' on all three of them, seeing is not believing!

Back Blurb

Ginji and Ban may have tracked down their client's treasure, they may have even taken it back, but the Transporters won't take getting trounced lightly. And the tenacious trio won't tire until they take out the terrible twosome once and for all.

Chapter Titles

Act III: Givers and Takers

  • Part 6: Rematch
  • Part 7: Magnetic Attraction
  • Part 8: Life's Simple Pleasures
  • Part 9: Like a Million Bucks

Act IV: The Sound of Life

  • Part 1: Music to My Ears
  • Part 2: Play it Again, Gang
  • Part 3: Music Soothes the Savage Beast
  • Part 4: A Better Mousetrap
name: Vol. 3

description:
Having finally learned the whereabouts of Madoka's Stradivarius violin, Ginji, Madoka and HEVN make their way to retrieve it and are confronted by the Protector, Ryuudou Hishiki. Unable to defeat the Protector, Ginji uses his power to cause a blackout, and Madoka, who, being blind, has lived her entire life in darkness, is the only one who can navigate the dark halls.

Back Blurb

They've found the Stradivarius. Now to the hard part-- getting it back! Of course, that is their job... and do it they must, even if it means once again going up against the mighty Protector, Ryudo Hishiki. The Protector is a big, burly, bone-crushing bodyguard with a serious beef to pick with out fearless heroes. But when Ginji takes out the lights, the brave turns to the blind Madoka to get them out of the bind.

Chapter Titles

Act IV: The Sound of Life

  • Part 5: When Animals Attack
  • Part 6: Fast Getaway
  • Part 7: Gone in 60 Seconds
  • Part 8: My Brother's Reaper
  • Part 9: The Ties that Bind
  • Part 10: Best of Show
  • Part 11: For the People
  • Part 12: Behind the Music
name: Vol. 4

description:
A newly discovered Van Gogh painting, the "Thirteenth Sunflower," is stolen by the mysterious thief known as Clayman. Despite knowing exactly where the painting is, Hachisu enlists the help of the GetBackers instead of going directly to the police. What is behind this mysterious request? And what is Himiko's connection to Clayman?

Back Blurb

A newly discovered Van Gogh painting has been stolen! Despite knowing exactly where the masterpiece has been stashed, the painting's caretaker steers clear of the police and enlists the help of the GetBackers. What is behind this mysterious request? Who is really working with the shadowy art thief?

Chapter Titles

Act V: Phantom Sunflower

  • Part 1: Art Van Gone
  • Part 2: Clayman Cometh
  • Part 3: Art Appreciation 101
  • Part 4: Burn, Baby, Burn
  • Part 5: The Art of Art Fraud
  • Part 6: The Curse of the Starving Class

Act VI: Return to Infinity Fortress

  • Part 1: Enter Akabane!
  • Part 2: Volts Reunited
  • Part 3: Kill and Be Killed
name: Vol. 5

description:
When the team splits up, Ginji finds himself alone with none other than Dr. Jackal, much to his concern. Meanwhile, Ban and Shido come face to face with the Magami brothers...who have altered their bodies to make themselves even stronger!

Chapter Titles

Act VI: Return to Infinity Fortress

  • Part 4: Strange Bedfellows
  • Part 5: The Body Shop
  • Part 6: For the Birds
  • Part 7: Face Off
  • Part 8: Strings Attached
  • Part 9: Pins and Needles
  • Part 10: Multiplicity
  • Part 11: One Good Turn
name: Vol. 6

description:
As Ban and Ginji make their way through the Infinite Castle, they encounter deadly puppets controlled by Makubex's "Wire Doll" system. They face a tough task of finding what's really behind Makubex's plans. But to find the truth, they'll have to look far beneath the surface.

Back Blurb

As Ban and Ginji make their way through the Infinite Fortress, they encounter MakubeX's "wire dolls" -- humans controlled and enhanced by computer programs. The duo embarks on a dangerous undertaking to find out what's really behind the explosive scheme. But to find the truth, they'll have to look far beneath the surface... and they might not like what they see!

Chapter Titles

Act VI: Return to Infinity Fortress

  • Part 12: All Tied Up and Nowhere to Go!
  • Part 13: The Fortress of the Dolls!
  • Part 14: When Bad Friends Attack!
  • Part 15: Fight for Your Right to Party!
  • Part 16: Good Times Gone Bad!
  • Part 17: Catching Up with Ginji!
  • Part 18: May We Come In?
  • Part 19: Ginji vs. Juubei!
  • Part 20: Akabane vs. Kagami! (Work's Never Done)
name: Vol. 7

description:
Just as MakubeX predicted, all the players have assembled at the underground base for a final cataclysmic clash. With six doors before them, the GetBackers and Co. must each take a door and face their chosen foe. Holographic heights and suicidal fights abound as secret needle attacks find their way into old friends' backs!

Back Blurb

MakubeX's prediction has come true! The players have assembled at the underground base for one final cataclysmic clash. Six doors stand before the GetBackers and Co., and behind each awats a chosen nemesis. Holographic heights and suicidal fights abound amid secret needle attacks--and one prickly spike finds its way into an old friend's back!

Chapter Titles

Act VI: Return to Infinity Fortress

  • Part 21: Notes from the Underground!
  • Part 22: One Step Closer!
  • Part 23: The Final Countdown!
  • Part 24: Reunited and It Feels So Good!
  • Part 25: Behind Closed Doors!
  • Part 26: Where Are We?
  • Part 27: Meet the Beastmaster!
  • Part 28: Room of Illusion!
  • Part 29: Juubei's Secret Move!
name: Vol. 8

description:
After Shido takes the defeated Emishi to the mysterious old healer Gen, they watch Gen's computer for a live feed of the other fights in various virtual arenas arranged by MakubeX for the rest of the GetBackers. While Kazuki pits his strings against and Juubei's flying needles in the Grand Canyon, Himiko finds herself about to be sacrificed by Kagami at an ancient Mayan pyramid!

Back Blurb

After Shido takes the defeated Emishi to the mysterious old healer Gen, they watch a live computer feed of the other fights. The remaining GetBackers square off against opponents in various virtual arenas arranged by MakubeX! Ban is pitted against a one-armed Fudo in Rome's Colosseum, and Ginji finds himself surrounded by the ghosts of old friends-- and one powerful opponent he thought he'd never see again!

Chapter Titles

Act VI: Return to Infinity Fortress

  • Part 30: Secrets Revealed
  • Part 31: Rain of Needles
  • Part 32: Faces of Betrayal
  • Part 33: A New Reality
  • Part 34: My Oh Mayan!
  • Part 35: Welcome Back, Ban!
  • Part 36: An Arm for an Arm
  • Part 37: Lightning Strikes!
  • Part 38: Lightning Strikes Twice!
name: Vol. 9

description:
With Ginji now in full Lightning Lord mode, he begins his rematch with the dangerous Akabane. Ban finally disposes of Fudou and rushes to stop Ginji and Akabane from killing each other. However, Makubex is about to complete his nuclear bomb and thus the final battle and the future of Infinity Fortress lies in the balance. Will the GetBackers be able to stop Tokyo from going up in flames?

Back Blurb

With Ginji now in full Lightning Lord mode, he begins his rematch with the ever-dangerous Akabane. Ban finally disposes of Fudou, and rushes to stop Ginji and Akabane from killing each other. However, MakubeX is about to complete his nuclear bomb... and thus begins the final battle, in which the future of Infinity Fortress hangs in the balance. Will the GetBackers be able to save Tokyo from complete and utter annihilation?

Chapter Titles

  • Part 39: Outta Control!
  • Part 40: Ginji Heats Up!
  • Part 41: Ginji Cools Down!
  • Part 42: A Virtual Showdown!
  • Part 43: Now, Go Ahead!
  • Part 44: Face to Face!
  • Part 45: In the Mind of Madness!
  • Part 46: Life's a Dream!
name: Vol. 10

description:
For the Get Backers getting rich is never quick. With MakubeX defeated and "I.L." in the hands of the GetBackers, the true mission now begins for Ban and Ginji...getting paid! But when Ban and Ginji are left out in the cold again and unable to pay even their tab at the coffee shop, it's up to Ban to come up with a scheme to lead them out of debt. Meanwhile, Shido gets tangled up in a sticky fight with a mysterious enemy that can control insects.

Chapter Titles

Act VI: Return to Infinity Fortress

  • Part 47: Infinity's New Beginning!
  • Part 48: Easy Come, Easy Go!

Interlude I: Operation: Retrieve the Retrieval Fee!

Interlude II: Shido & Madoka!

  • Part 1: Dress-Up Shido!
  • Part 2: Bug Off!
  • Part 3: A Sticky Situation
  • Part 4: Save the Last Song

Act VII: The Lost Arms of the Goddess

  • Part 1: Clayman Returns!
  • Part 2: The Pros and Cons of Hitchhiking!
name: Vol. 11

description:
Confusion turns to shock when Ban and Ginji's assailant is revealed. Barely able to escape with their lives, the GetBackers are on to the even more difficult task of boarding the ship that harbor the elusive arms of the Venus de Milo. However, even with the help of old friends like Shido and Emishi, will Ban and Ginji be able to overcome their new enemies and come out on top in the race for arms?

Back Blurb

Confusion turns to shock when Ban and Ginji's assailant is finally revealed. As the two sides exchange deadly attacks, will the GetBackers escape with their lives? A ship that harbors the elusive arms of the Venus de Milo awats the GetBackers. But when a new enemy emerges, will the help of old friends like Shido and Emishi be enough to win this arms race?

Chapter Titles

Act VII: The Lost Arms of the Goddess

  • Part 3: All Aboard!
  • Part 4: GetBackers Gettin' On!
  • Part 5: Eating with the Enemy
  • Part 6: The Party Begins
  • Part 7: Enjoy the Show!
  • Part 8: Ban's Grand Entrance
  • Part 9: Approaching Shore
  • Part 10: Welcome to Battleship Island!
  • Part 11: Venus' Identity Exposed!
name: Vol. 12

description:
Ban, Shido, and Emishi make their plans for rescuing Ginji...and for retrieving the limbs of the Venus! Meanwhile, Ginji talks to Miss Hela about her hatred of the Venus de Milo and her plans to destroy its mystique by reattaching its arms! The final battles begin with everyone facing off and the secret behind the seven Mirokus is revealed!

Chapter Titles

Act VII: The Lost Arms of the Goddess

  • Part 12: The Arms of the Enemy!
  • Part 13: All Together, Now!
  • Part 14: Killing Time!
  • Part 15: Mighty Aphrodite!
  • Part 16: The Auction Approaches!
  • Part 17: Miroku's Secret!
  • Part 18: Seven on One!
  • Part 19: Ginji Cuts the Lights!
  • Part 20: Ready to Roll!
name: Vol. 13

description:
Now that their fights are over, Ginji and Ban head over to the auction to retrieve the Venus de Milo. With a ploy nothing short of typical for this team, the GetBackers escape with their prize. But, alas, there is never enough cash to go around, so the GetBackers quickly take up a job to retrieve a diamond ring from a hot spring...where the duo battles feral monkeys! If that wasn't enough to drive Ban and Ginji bananas, they are pulled onto a case involving missing children and a strange card game.

Chapter Titles

Act VII: The Lost Arms of the Goddess

  • Part 21: Hiding Trees in a Forest
  • Part 22: A Farewell to Arms
  • Part 23: The Goddess Returns
  • Part 24: Goodbye to Liu

Interlude III: Let's Go to the Hot Springs!

  • Part 1: Rock Hunting
  • Part 2: Overwhelming Attack

Act VIII: Divine Design

  • Part 1: The More Things Change
  • Part 2: What's in the Cards?
  • Part 3: A New Deal Begins
name: Vol. 14

description:
Ginji and Ban are back on the trail of some missing kids and the Divine Design card game that lured them away. When the GetBackers infiltrate the game company's headquarters, Ban faces off against a powerful foe who's playing for keeps with a stacked deck! But when a bewitching beauty up shows up, will she steal Ginji’s heart?!

Chapter Titles

Act VIII: Divine Design

  • Part 4: Namaste
  • Part 5: The Gaze of the Gorgon
  • Part 6: Akinetopsia
  • Part 7: Faith and Doubt
  • Part 8: Light-Bearer/Serpent-Bearer
  • Part 9: Unhappy Reunion
  • Part 10: Quiet as the Dwq
  • Part 11: ¡Buenas Noches!
  • Part 12: You Can't Bake a Cake
name: Vol. 15

description:
The battle for the Cards continues to heat up as Ban and Ginji try to complete their training and become Dominators. But things won't be easy as they face off against Lucifer's Archangels. Luckily for the GetBackers, makubex has sent in a powerful ally to assist them. Will it be enough or have Ban and Ginji finally met their match?

Chapter Titles

Act VIII: Divine Design

  • Part 13: In the Face of Danger
  • Part 14: The King's Blood
  • Part 15: Red Strong of Fate
  • Part 16: Puppet on a String
  • Part 17: Appointment with the Cursed Claw
  • Part 18: Thanatopsis
  • Part 19: Field of Lavender
  • Part 20: Trojan Horse
  • Part 21: Guardian of the West Gate
name: Vol. 16

description:
As the fight against Lucifer and his Archangels heats up, Ginji and Himiko both come face-to-face with ghosts from their pasts when they battle the Holy Guardian Beasts. And when Ban finds himself having an out-of-body experience, will a man from Kazuki's past come back to haunt the GetBackers?

Chapter Titles

Act VIII: Divine Design

  • Part 22: A Brother's Memory
  • Part 23: Twin Dragons
  • Part 24: The Rules of Reality
  • Part 25: For Longhua's Sake
  • Part 26: Devil's Gambit
  • Part 27: Divide and Conquer
  • Part 28: Dyed in Blood
  • Part 29: Illusions and Specters
  • Part 30: Coup de Grace
name: Vol. 17

description:
The battle for the cards finally reaches its climax as Ban faces Lucifer in the toughest fight he's yet seen in his life. Could a kiss result in a happy ending for all? Meanwhile, with Divine Design behind them, Ban and Ginji begin a brand new mission to retrieve a dozen ancient bottles of wine that may be hiding a terrifying secret.

Chapter Titles

Act VIII: Divine Design

  • Part 31: The Key
  • Part 32: The Wall
  • Part 33: Fortune's Hand
  • Part 34: Witch Blood
  • Part 35: Where They Belong
  • Part 36: Hole Card

Act IX: Marine Red

  • Part 1: Out of the Depths
  • Part 2: On the Road Again
  • Part 3: The Sting
name: Vol. 18

description:
Hired to retrieve a dozen bottles of wine from the 1940s, the GetBackers must face a slew of new obstacles. How will Ban and Ginji survive against a warrior who controls killer wasps? And what secrets are buried in the wine bottles that makes them valuable enough to kill for?

Chapter Titles

Act IX: Marine Red

  • Part 4: Insecticide
  • Part 5: The Face of the Enemy
  • Part 6: The Devil's Virus
  • Part 7: Bee-Trayal
  • Part 8: Battle for the Bottle
  • Part 9: Immortal Bloodsucking Demon
  • Part 10: The Brew that is True
  • Part 11: Give to the Poor

Act X: The Eternal Bond

  • Part 1: On His Knees
name: Vol. 19

description:
Worried about mysterious foes lurking in the shadows, Shido has even hired the murderous Akabane to assist him. What is the grave threat that has Shido so worried and will he seek help from the GetBackers? The action heats up as Ban and Ginji face great danger.

Chapter Titles

Act X: The Eternal Bond

  • Part 2: A Light in the Darkness
  • Part 3: The Silence of the Butterflies
  • Part 4: Kidnapped!
  • Part 5: Reinforcements
  • Part 6: The Proper Time
  • Part 7: China Street
  • Part 8: The Fearsome Tarantula Brothers
  • Part 9: In the Spider's Nest
  • Part 10: Fifty Percent
name: Vol. 20

description:
An all-out war between sworn enemies--the Mariudo and Kiriudo clans--is about to erupt with the GetBackers caught right in the middle! Ban and Ginji continue to struggle against their Kiriudo foes until they're forced to go all out. Will Ban's Evil Eye save the day once again? And when Ginji's transformation into the Lightning Lord goes horribly wrong, his enemies aren't the only one's whose lives are at risk...

Chapter Titles

Act X: The Eternal Bond

  • Part 11: Why Do We Fight?
  • Part 12: Karmic Burden
  • Part 13: In the Spider's Lair
  • Part 14: Say Goodbye to the Neighborhood
  • Part 15: Out of Juice
  • Part 16: Akabane-san Is Smiling
  • Part 17: Cicadas!! Cicadaaas!!
  • Part 18: Bailing Out
  • Part 19: Invasion of the Puns
name: Vol. 21

description:
Ban and Ginji may be the perfect team, but competition is on the way with the new pairing of Emishi and Natsuki...though this new duo seems more concerned with cracking jokes than kicking butt. How will they react to an army of giant mantises? And what is Natsuki's terrifying ability? Meanwhile, Ban may have met his match in an old friend turned new enemy yet again.

Chapter Titles

Act X: The Eternal Bond

  • Part 20: Trust All Your Cards
  • Part 21: I'd Jump Out!
  • Part 22: The End of the Evil Eye
  • Part 23: What Is Death?
  • Part 24: Perfect Harmony
  • Part 25: Life is Tenacity
  • Part 26: Emishi's Strongest Asset
  • Part 27: 400 Cow-Sized Spiders
  • Part 28: Why We Fight
name: Vol. 22

description:
With the Shiki clan members finally assembled, the real battle is about to begin! The Kiriudo send their strongest warriors against the GetBackers, but Ginji still hasn't regained his electric powers. Will he be able to survive with the odds stacked against him? And Ban must face Dokubachi, the powerful Bee Master who wants to even the score!

Chapter Titles

Act X: The Eternal Bond

  • Part 29: Welcome to Beast Palace
  • Part 30: Ghost Ship
  • Part 31: Die! Die! Die! Die!
  • Part 32: The Well of Sadness
  • Part 33: Death Is Somebody Else's Problem
  • Part 34: The Babe Unborn vs. the Mud Men
  • Part 35: The Future of the Kiriudo
  • Part 36: Fighting Lessons
  • Part 37: The Power of His Violence
name: Vol. 23

description:
The GetBackers have made their way to Insect Palace where their ultimate foe, Kabuto, resides. Will they be able to stop Kabuto's dark ambition? Or will a surprise traitor spell their doom?

Chapter Titles

Act X: The Eternal Bond

  • Part 38: Bridge of Fish
  • Part 39: Reunions
  • Part 40: Entering the Arena
  • Part 41: Sacrificial Lambs
  • Part 42: Stairway to Hell
  • Part 43: I'll Only Need a Minute
  • Part 44: The Traitor in Your Midst
  • Part 45: My Final Gift
  • Part 46: Tyrant of Chaos
name: Vol. 24

description:
So much has been lost in this war. When the battle with Kabuto finally ends, will there be any reason to celebrate? Can Ban and Ginji find a ray of hope amidst the devastation that surrounds them?

Chapter Titles

Act X: The Eternal Bond

  • Part 47: I Can't Help Laughing
  • Part 48: I'm King Of The World
  • Part 49: We Are a Happy Family
  • Part 50: The Taste of Home
  • Part 51: The Life of the God of Death
  • Part 52: MarubeX's Game
  • Part 53: Tag! You're It!
  • Part 54: A Good Dream

Interlude 4: The Retriever's Second Anniversary
name: Vol. 25

description: How did the GetBackers originally team up? In GetBackers: Infinity Fortress, begin a mind-blowing journey to the past--and see the early days of Ginji and Ban. Here are the continuing adventures of everyone's favorite retrieval team--leading to the final showdown in the mysterious, dark tower known as Infinity Fortress!
name: Vol. 1

description: Ban Mido has the power to create illusions in people's minds. Ginji Amano has the power to amplify electricity. Together they are the invincible retrieval team known as the GetBackers! The boys get more than they bargained for when they accept a seemingly simple job of finding a lost dog named Lucky. But when they discover what makes this dog so special, they will hope that their luck doesn't run out!
name: Vol. 2

description: Who ya gonna call? GHOSTBUSTERS, of course! Find out what's been happening since the Ghostbusters last saved New York City as Peter, Ray, Egon, Winston and the rest of the gang make their first manga appearance! The phrase "Everyone's a critic" takes on a whole new meaning when the crew is called in to help out a troubled Broadway production. Later, Ray learns that being a Ghostbuster isn't always the thrill-a-minute job he'd imagined it would be. And Egon has a touching interlude with a former instructor who still has a thing or two to learn about the afterlife. Then it all comes down to the ultimate showdown between our heroes and a team of peeved poltergeists. The Ghostbusters are about to be Ghost Busted!
name: Ghost Busted

description: Includes Garth Ennis's original series proposal; published and unpublished cover sketches by Clayton Crain; and a soup-to-nuts behind-the-scenes featurette detailing the progression from script to thumbnail to final art.

name: "In the Beginning was the Word" Quotations

description:
Abbey must attend the Illuminary's Ball, a posh affair where a good impression with the Illuminary, head of all fantastic creatures, is crucial. But heading with Michael into her private meeting, arch-rival Lilith slips her a mickey that makes her act uncontrollably badly!

"Boneyard Volume One In Full Color" is a digest sized trade paperback which collects Issues #1-4 of the comic book series Boneyard by Richard Moore and published by NBM.

This edition reprints these issues in color; the original comic books were in black and white. Also, there are additional character sketches at the back of the trade along with a pin-up sketch.
name: Boneyard In Color

volume.name: Boneyard Volume One In Full Color

description: Now that Belzebub has been dealt a blow, it's the turn of the IRS to make Paris' life hell. But then, a certain beauteous Roxanna miraculously appears looking to solve all monetary problems. Paris resists as best he can, even putting on a monsters boxing contest to raise money but the lures and the pressures... how strong can he stay?
name: Boneyard Volume Two

volume.name: Boneyard Volume Two In Full Color

description: Glump devises a wondrous scheme to do a Monsters on the Beach special swimsuit issue to help the cash-strapped Michael Paris. Never mind that Glump is hiding a much worse scheme within the scheme! On a darker note, Roxanne shows her true demonic self resulting in a potentially deadly showdown with Abbey.
name: Boneyard Volume Three

volume.name: Boneyard Volume Three In Full Color

description: As Abbey the vampire recovers from her showdown with the much more powerful Lilith, Swamp girl Nessie starts taking the upper hand in her pursuit of Michael Paris. Meanwhile, Glump continues his farcical schemes to rule the world, launching the "Doomsday Frog!" However, all are quickly brought back together to face a new threat: zombies sprouting up from the cemetery!
name: Boneyard Volume Four

volume.name: Boneyard Volume Four In Full Color

description: Abbey, Michael and the Boneyard gang have to confront a two-pronged threat: a huge masked chainsaw -wielding uh, massacerist in a girl’s summer camp and the Pumpkinhead whose very presence puts all in the ‘yard into fevered sleep. Abbey barely survives the confrontation with the chainsaw brute, now it’s up to Michael to face the worst threat… with Nodoze and a baseball bat! (collects issues 16-20).
name: Boneyard Volume 5

volume.name: Boneyard Volume Five In Full Color

description: Abbey must attend the Luminary’s Ball, a posh affair where a good impression with the Luminary, head of all fantastic creatures, is crucial. But heading with Michael into her private meeting, arch-rival Lilith slips her a mickey that makes her act uncontrollably badly! Collects issues 21-24.
name: Boneyard Volume 6

volume.name: Boneyard Volume Six In Full Color

description: The final volume, at least for a long while as Moore takes an indefinite break. Michael Paris and Abbey are up against powerful rival armies in the land of Faeries. Michael look helplessly caught but Abbey raises one powerful army of her own! In this grand spectacular finale, even in the midst of action and suspense, Moore mixes his usual irresistible deadpan humor and magic characterization. Collects issues 25-28.
name: Boneyard Volume Seven

volume.name: Boneyard Volume Seven In Full Color

description:
Collecting the acclaimed 5-issue miniseries written by Alan Moore that featured the return of TOP 10's Smax the Dragon Killer! What happens when Jeff Smax and Toybox return to Smax's homeworld? One thing's for sure — it won't be pretty!

Back Blurb

The unlikely partnership of police officers Jeff Smax, a gigantic blue-skinned warrior with impressive powers known simply as SMAX, and Robyn Slinger, a naive newby with a collection of clever crime-fighting gadgets who has taken the name TOYBOX, faced a variety of bizarre and deadly criminals on the urban streets of Neopolis, where every citizen has some kind of power or talent, as members of the Neopolis Police Department, DIvision 10, known on the street as TOP 10.

Now Smax and Toybox, on leave from their precinct duties, are about to face a new adventure on Smax's homeworld, where he has been called back to attend the funeral of his uncle. Jeff Smax, known there as Jaafs Maxson, has a long and complicated history that he has been successfully avoiding in Neopolis, and to help him deal with it, he asks Robyn to accompany him to his backwater world where science is unknown and myth and magic are the order of the day.

Before long, the partners are swept deep into a dangerous quest that will take all their resources, and the help of some new and old friends, to resolve an unfinished battle and put Jeff's haunting past to rest...but only if Robyn can find a way to use her own unique abilities!
name: SMAX

description: Reprints issues 1-12 of Jack Staff Volume 1.
name: Everything Used to be Black and White

volume.name: Jack Staff: Everything Used to be Black and White

description: Dr. Jonathan Weir has for decades been the keeper of The Purple Claw- an ancient and powerful mystical artifact that is lethal to all things evil. The popular supporting cast member from the pages of AC's Femforce (And caretaker to dozens of slumbering Golden Age champions in his Vault Of Heroes. ) gets his own one-shot special. In a new lead story ( That also incorporates a partial flashback of the "origin" of The Purple Claw, originally seen in AC Annual # 2) Dr. Weir battles a nemesis from almost forty years ago- Countess Arachni, in "The Woman In The Web", written and layed out by Bill Black, drawn by Chris Allen, and inked by Chris Dreier and Mark Heike. A weird and spooky modern-day tale. Then, in a special classic Golden Age reprint from The Purple Claw's original run, you get the complete "The Web Of Horror", chronicling Doc Weir's first run-in with Arachni, back in the 1950's, as drawn by Brown and Gantz, as crisp, sharp and perfect as the day it was drawn. Color cover by Bill Black, interiors are black and white with graytones.
name: Woman In The Web/The Web Of Horror

description:
The main feature this issue is "Little Archie".  
  
Featuring the stories: 
 
The Funny Man 
 
Jest Jokes (A One Page Gag) 
 
Dog Daze (Little Sabrina) 
 
The Little Gentleman 
 
Dog-Gone
name: The Funny Man

description:
She travels in time, to change the future of the Earth: here comes Lilith!

A gloom future awaits the human race, a future where they’ll have to face extermination. But this apocalyptic event can be avoided by intervening in the past. One chronoagent and one only, a young woman who’s been born and raised only to this purpose, is entrusted with the mission to save the humankind from its doomed fate. She will have to unceasingly go up and down in the space-time, to track the unwitting carriers of the alien parasite she has to eliminate, to avoid the end of the human race. And she’ll have to undergo a complete change: leaving aside compassion and moral scruples, she’ll become Lilith, the killer.
name: Il segno del Triacanto

description:
A new time warp brings Lilith at the peak of the Pirates Era!

Travelling in time, Lilith and Scuro land around 1650, during the era when the Spanish overseas possessions were constantly raided by the Dutch and English privateers. After a tragical unexpected twist of their mission, they are suddenly tossed a century later, at the peak of the Caribbean piracy in the first decades of the 18th century. Here they'll have to chase their evasive target, fighting side by side with the buccaneers that battle against the whole world, attacking vessel from any country, under the “Jolly Roger”, the banner of King Death.
name: Il vessillo di Re Morte

description:
In the middle of WWI, Lilith hunts her prey down on the blood-covered Italian front!

Lilith finds herself on the Italian front, while WWI is raging, the day before Caporetto rout. This time, her target has a face and a name— it’s a member of the Italian Alpine troops, whose name was drawn for the “decimation”. He’s now running away from the military authorities, and his company's captain is tracking him down, looking for a private revenge. Lilith will have to follow his prey along the whole front, form Carnia mountains to the Carso plateau…
name: Il fronte di pietra

description:
The triacanth sought by Lilith is hiding among the Confederates led by the ruthless William Quantrill!

Lilith awakes drifting in the waters of the Mississippi River, in the midst of the American Civil War. Following the Triacanth traces, she sails upriver to reach a border area between Missouri, a secessionist state, and the abolitionist Kansas. This “bloody line” is roamed by the irregular Confederate bands, who fight a fierce guerrilla warfare against the Union’s regular troops. Lilith must find the “carrier” among the men of William Quantrill, leader of one of the most infamous gangs of Confederate “rebels”. Along her hunt, Lilith will cross paths with legendary characters such as Bloody Bill Anderson and brothers Frank and Jesse James...
name: Cavalcando con il diavolo

description: Following the tracks of the archaeologist Howard , mysteriously disappeared , Martin discovers a pillar of stone with hieroglyphs hidden in Central America , in a jungle of Belize . And if the ancient Egyptians had arrived in America before Columbus?
name: La vendetta di Râ
Uro, la Furia dei Barbari (152 / II)

description: ...with the original drawing used for the cover!
name: La Voce del Sangue (115 / II)
Il Dominio di una Tomba (97 / II)
